      • getOccupants

        public java.util.Collection<rocks.xmpp.extensions.muc.Occupant> getOccupants(rocks.xmpp.core.session.XmppClient client,
                                                                             rocks.xmpp.addr.Jid roomAddress)
        Gets a Collection of Occupants of the chat room, that is people currently in the chat room.
        Parameters:
        client - the XmppClient object used to communicate with the server
        roomAddress - a Jid representing the address of the room
        Returns:
        a Collection of Occupant representing each person in the room

      • createAndOrEnterRoom

        public AppMuc createAndOrEnterRoom(rocks.xmpp.core.session.XmppClient client,
                                   BabblerBase babblerBase,
                                   rocks.xmpp.addr.Jid roomJid,
                                   java.lang.String nick,
                                   GetMUCEvent messageEvent)
                            throws ConfideFailedToEnterChatRoomException,
                                   ConfideFailedToConfigureChatRoomException
        Creates a room with address roomJid, or retreives it if it already exists. Configures the room. Enters the room with the given nickname Creates a AppMuc object to represent the room Retrieves a list of occupants and puts them in the AppMuc object Sets up message adn occupant listeners, and connects them to the AppMuc object returns the AppMuc object
        Parameters:
        client - the XmppClient object used to communicate with the server
        babblerBase -
        roomJid - a Jid representing the address of the room
        nick - the nickname to enter with
        Returns:
        an AppMuc object representing the room
        Throws:
        ConfideFailedToEnterChatRoomException
        ConfideFailedToConfigureChatRoomException
